headline: Verizon Lawsuit Puts T-Mobile Advertising Claims And Valuation In Focus
summary: Verizon has filed a false advertising lawsuit against T-Mobile US, alleging exaggerated consumer savings claims in recent marketing. The lawsuit seeks damages and a court order to stop the challenged ads. The case centers on how T-Mobile, NasdaqGS:TMUS, compares its pricing to Verizon for wireless customers. T-Mobile US is a major US wireless carrier focused on mobile connectivity and related services, competing directly with Verizon and AT&T for subscriber growth and customer loyalty. The...
